name: Decolello ----- Little Chef Wood Playset
description:
--- Little Chef Wood Playset ---
Decolello, Decole Japan

This out of this world cute wood playsent needs no introduction! You guys have been asking for it, so we bend over backwards to find them. They are in very very limited numbers (might just be 2!), so do save your moolah for one of these babies! Vegetables in the pot can be "cute in half" coz they velcro together. Comes with everything you see, except the florspace cube wallets. For 3 years and above. ;+)

The box measures 4.75" by 4.5, 5.5" height
Comes with a box of its own. Will pack well for shipping.

Check out the other cuteness available!


-----
Boring Stuff.
Payment is to be made at the time of purchase.
Direct deposit for Singapore, Paypal everywhere else.
Shipping by registered airmail.

name: Decole Classic Mushroom Picture Frame
description:
What a rare find! I only have 1 of this available so do grab it while its available! Literally a mushroom, the space in its stem is for a little treasured image to call home!

Measures about 6" tall.
Comes with its own cardboard box.

More pictures here! - http://maisonflorspace.blogspot.com/2009/03/decole-mushroom-photo-frame.html

name: Decole France ----- Matryoshka Nesting Eggs Red or Blue
description:
--- Matryoshka Nesting Eggs Red or Blued---
Decole Japan

This is one rare Decole item! I think it was one of the first items that got me permanently stuck onto the irresistibly kawaii zakka items by Decole. 4 little wooden French Eggs, each wearing a red beret, expect for Tres Petite who is a card holder. There's 4 of them, Grande, Moyenne, Petite & wee little Tres Petite. Put your little secret trinkets in them! Perfect as deco in your little maison. I have mine in the kitchen, just to cute up the place a bit. ;+)

Approx. 4" height for Grande. Tres Petite is slightly less than 1.5".
You're getting a new in package Eggs, the one shown belongs to the Home. :+)

4 eggs in a set, pick Red or Blue

Check out the other cuteness available at the Home!

Please do visit my flickr pages for more pictures!
http://www.flickr.com/photos/florspace/sets/72157610043351448/

name: Tenorikuma by Sanrio ----- The Bear Phone Holder
description:
--- The Bear Phone Holder ---
Tenorikuma by Sanrio Japan
Original licensed product

Um, as you guys would know, I have trouble resisting extremely adorable things. I can spot them miles away and would rush to them despite highway traffic. This one is no exception. Its SOooo cute, I forgone a growling stomach, just to pick 4 of the cutest to share! Tenorikuma, bears that fit in your palm, is one of my favorite character from Sanrio! I'm a starbucks kinda gal, so this explains everything! One cute cell/mobile phone holder, he's got really soft, smooth & firm fur. Promises to love you and brighten up your otherwise boring tabletop!

Approx. 5" across Tenorikuma's face, 4" tall, 3.5" wide.
You're getting a new in package Phone Holder, the one shown belongs to the Home. :+)

Check out the other cuteness available!
